## Synopsis

First, we read the data into R:

```{r}
rawdata <- read.csv(file="repdata_data_StormData.csv", header=TRUE, skip=0);
rawdata$BGN_DATE <- as.POSIXct(as.character(rawdata$BGN_DATE), format="%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S");
```
